title: SonicWall security advisory (AV25-466)
description: On July 29, 2025, SonicWall published a security advisory to address a vulnerability in the following products:
products: Gen7 hardware Firewalls  version 7.2.0-7015 and prior
Gen7 virtual Firewalls (NSv)  version 7.2.0-7015 and prior
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
